lead_paragraph: Poor supervision and a lack of clear authority is one reason costs for the Tokyo 2020 Olympics have soared to more than four times original estimates, the head of a Tokyo panel tasked with slashing expenses said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Poor Supervision Behind Rising 2020 Costs: Panel Head
headline.main: Poor Supervision Behind Rising 2020 Costs: Panel Head
